data.title: The Nobel Prize for Physiology or Medicine
data.text:
The Nobel Assembly at Karolinska Instituet is responsible for selecting the Nobel Laureates in Physiology or Medicine.

1901-1910 | 1911-1920 | 1921-1930 | 1931-1940 | 1941-1950 | 1951-1960 | 1961-1970 | 1971-1980 | 1981-1990 | 1991-2000 | 2001-2010 | 2011-

[all links in the list will open in a new window]
